snippet: As the National Liberation Front of Corsica declares it is ending its 38-year armed struggle for independence from France, some question whether it’s a real olive branch, or a ruse.
lead_paragraph: As the National Liberation Front of Corsica declares it is ending its 38-year armed struggle for independence from France, some question whether it’s a real olive branch, or a ruse.

headline.main: In Corsica, Pursuing Autonomy by Other Means
headline.print_headline: In Corsica, Pursuing Autonomy by Other Means
